nodes.text: Mos Doba was a town located on the desert planet Tatooine. By the time of the Galactic Civil War, it had been taken over by a group of mercenaries. Sometime between 0 ABY and 3 ABY, it was was freed by Saponza's Gang, which had allied itself with the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
The town had several buildings, and was encircled by walls, with a shield generator sitting in its center. Its perimeter was protected by four rapid-Fire turrets and four proton mortars.
Mos Doba appears in the 2014 Canon mobile game Star Wars: Commander.
